title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 603.7 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 603.7 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) Except where
fees are established by law, rule or regulation, no fee shall be charged for: (1)
inspection of a record; (2)
record searches; or
(3)
certification (see section
603.13
[a]
of this

Part) pursuant to this Part. (b) The fee for photocopying records
available pursuant to this Part shall be 25 cents per single-sided
page. (c) Fees shall be paid in
full prior to issuance of copies, transcripts or their certification. (d) Payment shall be made in the form of a
check, bank draft or money order payable to the "New York State Office for

People With Developmental Disabilities" or, if personally delivered, may be
made in cash for which a receipt shall be given. (e) A fee may be waived or reduced at the
discretion of the records access officer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
603.7

Amended

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
